website_summaries.verdict: A versatile faucet in terms of valve fit and with minimal leakage.
pros: Customers note the quality in both material and overall fit
Shines like a diamond with proper care
cons: This product may require some valve configuration for it to work properly

customer_reviews.title: THE INTERIOR PLASTIC BREAKS IMMEDIATELY!
customer_reviews.text: TOTAL CRAP. We bought ten for our motel and the plastic interior has already broken on four of them in less than a week. DON'T DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect “1 size fits all” diverter drain
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a replacement diverter drain as my plumbing outlet has a 1/2” pipe with a threaded 3/4” male connection extending 3-7/16” out from the wall. I picked this Delta faucet because it provided several opinions/fittings. I was pleasantly surprised to see I didn’t need any of the supplied parts. The female threaded front end mount on the drain diverter fit perfectly, no cutting, soldering, it took less than 2 min to add the supplied thread tape and twisted it on.
customer_reviews.author: Don Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Popped off and almost hit my 6yo in the face
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews before puchasing. I saw that someone said a plastic part breaks inside the tub spout. Sad to say I thought it might have been bad luck ... well if it was, I was cursed with the same break. The scary part is it nearly hit my 6yo in the face! Please heed the previous warning and stay away from this one, not only to save you the head ache, but perhaps an expensive trip to the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Poor Poor Quality and Design, Cheap Chinese Product in Delta Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Junk...disappointing product from Delta. Poorly designed as it tries to be universal to a fault and doesn't work well for any one application. The instructions are comically cryptic, excluding parts, bad drawings, etc. The quality is typical average Chinese...just good enough to be accepted by the duped American consumer. Save yourself the frustration of thinking you're buying a quality product from an honest American company. This is nothing but Chinese junk in Delta packaging. You might as well buy the cheap stuff from Menards, its actually better than this product, less expensive and is honest about where its made. I have Delta throughout my house, this is the last Delta product I will buy...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Universal - included adapters for multiple types of tub spouts
customer_reviews.text: I needed the type that was threaded near the diverter (spout end). This product included silicone pipe tape and was easy for me to install. There was and adapter included that would move the threads back to the wall end if you only have a short pipe sticking out from the wall. You may want to consider also purchasing an escutcheon plate to take up any space between the spout and wall. Spout & diverter work as intended (although water does come out a bit sputtery and not in a solid straight down stream, but most importantly no water leaks out the bottom when the diverter is pulled up for the shower.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Included Teflon tape as well as adapters.
customer_reviews.text: The reach is about 1/4" less than the original so it doesn't come up flush to the wall with my existing pipe. This is minor since the water doesn't flow in that part of the faucet anyway. If I was annoyed by it I'd remove my original pipe and put in a shorter piece. It was easy to install, fitting perfectly on my existing pipe. It included the Teflon tape so I didn't have to provide my own. The divertor works smoothly. No leaks. It took me more time to look at the directions than to do the install.
customer_reviews.author: JamesL

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend buying this one if you have a non-threaded pipe
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend buying this one if you have a non-threaded pipe. In order for me to use this, the directions say to cut ("as straight as possible") the adapter (plastic) piece with a hacksaw, which I did. The piece then would not thread properly into the spout. So, maybe I didn't cut it perfectly, but my sticking point is that I shouldn't have to hacksaw anything that claims to be universal. The rest of the parts were of good quality, directions were clear enough. Consider buying if you have a threaded pipe, as you wouldn't have to alter anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Delta original
customer_reviews.text: These are not the original Delta parts. I stopped by at Home Depot and noticed that the off-brand universal parts was the exact same model design right to the T. The only difference is that it has Delta etched on it. The issue is that the universal part off brand was $14. So you're better off buying the off brand since they are identical. Also Delta doesn't mark their parts by etching.
customer_reviews.author: Irv

customer_reviews.title: Still good
customer_reviews.text: The replacement faucet works very well. I had an issue with the pin diverting water to the shower head on my previous Delta faucet due to very hard water in my area and the build-up caused a delay to the shower head. Reason for 4 stars is because the water that comes out of the new faucet isn't an attractive stream but more so an erratic spraying effect as if one put their finger over a running garden hose
customer_reviews.author: OK chief

customer_reviews.title: Delta makes the most common household plumbing = very painful install + modifications
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why Delta thinks the most common rough-in (1/2" copper stub out aka slip fit) should be the most difficult, time consuming, and tool requiring installation (hacksaw and vice.) Pro tip. Do not cut the threads if you can avoid it, put 3 wraps of the included incredibly thin tape on the "3/4" Adapter" and tighten it down as far as you can by hand, see if you can carefully slip the entire assembly down to the wall. Don't bother tightening the alen set screw on the coupler unless it's very loose, or you have kids that like to pull thing out of the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Might be good product, DO NOT FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a fine piece of hardware. Unfortunately I followed the instructions to the letter. I cut the adapter at the space in the threads. That does not leave enough threads for the spout to engage and screw on to. I am returning. Update: They replaced it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: SD Abingdon, MD

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't very good and diverter is a leaker
customer_reviews.text: Internal parts are crappy plastic junk. For a slip fit you have to cut one of the parts that it comes with and then it's nearly impossible to get it to thread up to the metal piece. They could have spent an extra $0.13 and included another plastic piece so it would have worked better but, of course, the corporate hacks decided against doing that to boost profits. The diverter doesn't give a very good seal either so you're going to deal with $$$ down the drain with every shower because of wasted water and energy that heated that water.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: The spout itself looks nice, and does not leak when diverted to the ...
customer_reviews.text: The spout itself looks nice, and does not leak when diverted to the shower. The plastic adapter was universal in that it provided enough attachments to meet almost any pipe that was already in place, but being plastic it was not particularly sturdy. I ended up going to a home improvement store to buy a 3/4 to 1/2 brass adapter and a 2 inch brass nipple to make this work, but it was still better an less expensive than any other options.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you have a half inch slip-fit pipe.
customer_reviews.text: This is not compatible out of the box with a half inch slip fit. You need to use a hacksaw to trim down an adapter to make it fit, so it's an extra pain in the butt if you have a 1/2-in slip fit. Just get something that's designed for your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Hertzler

customer_reviews.title: Only the Original
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to replicate and thus you need to get the original faucet. It was very easy to install; it took me about 5 minutes. With imitations, there were leaks and very frustrating experience trying to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The m,ost limited of 'handypeople' can install this GREAT faucet in no time at all.
customer_reviews.text: To say I know NOTHING about plumbing is an overstatement. I have a track record of messing up the simplest of plumbing tasks. THIS ONE WAS GREAT ..... Got it on in 5 minutes. NOTE .... that was after 3 hours attempting the install the Danco 88703 Universal Tub Spout with Diverter , which I also bought. I planned on returning the one I liked less. Well didn't return the Danco since there was only half broken pieces and many of the included adapters were lost, down the drain ... I don't know .... 3 horrific hours. After giving up, I had no choice but to try again. THE DELTA went on in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: JonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: If you have a longer threaded stem, you need a saw
customer_reviews.text: This looked pretty easy to install. However, you need to thread plastic into metal, and if your stem sticks out more than 1/2 inch from the wall, you'll be needing to cut some threads off. When I did that, it seemed like it would be OK... until it cross-threaded itself. I thought the cut was straight enough, and I even filed it down a bit to make it straighter. It was not, and once it's cross-threaded it's done. It's not going to seat right, or seal. Delta cheaped out on manufacture, and it shows. I'm not getting another one. 17 bucks down the tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Clark

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: The plastic that attaches to the stub out is cheap, the threads don't hold so it won't tighten and keeps spinning. This will cause it to leak behind the spout and get water behind the wall.
customer_reviews.author: R. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit - Everything You Need
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy swap and perfect fit, replacing an old unit whose diverter valve had failed. It includes adapters Teflon tape, and a key tool in the set. Good unit, made this a 4 minute job. Highly recommended. 2016-06-06 Update I ordered a second one of these units for another bath. Just like the first (which still works fine), this one fit perfectly and works great. Many adapters, fittings, etc are included should you have an unusual installation requirement.
customer_reviews.author: Dale in Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: This is the same as the Danco spout, for $17.30
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Danco spout, put it on, and it came up about a 1/4" short. So I order this one, since everything else I have is Delta brand. It is the exact same thing, except in a different package, with a higher price. I have no idea if the quality or plating is better, and will last longer, as I didn't bother to install it, and am returning it, since 1), I can get it cheaper, and 2) to make it fit, I am going to have to modify the copper stem pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, comes with multiple adapters.
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a new one since ours kept making this annoying high pitch. I went to Home Depot and the guy tells me he couldn't help me because I didn't have the model of the one I had. Like really? All I needed was a new diverter spout. Came back home and watched a video from "This old house" on YT. Ordered this spout and installed it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Monish

customer_reviews.title: This product is just as good as the one I had before but does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my old one was leaking all the water when the shower is on. This product is just as good as the one I had before but does not leak which is pretty much what I needed. The color is just like the picture. I didn't have any problem with it so far and only time will tell how good this product is. However, the instructions were a little hard to follow for me because I never in my life did something similar but with a little effort I figured it out my self and didn't have to call help.
customer_reviews.author: Shorouq

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Our last faucet randomly came apart, shower pin fell off. Still worked but was slightly inconvenient. New one works just like a shower faucet is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Straight swap for the one we had that didn't seal properly. Love it. Easy to install: just screw the old one off and Screw this one on. took 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: L Warriner

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement but was 1/8" shorter than my old one.
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement but was 1/8" shorter than my old one so I had to add a "tub spout ring" to fill the 1/8". This kit comes with plumbers tape included.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy

customer_reviews.title: Was sooo easy wish I had done it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Put in one bath over 2 months ago. Was sooo easy wish I had done it sooner!! Product seems good so far and holding up with two kids beating on it. Put another one in the second bath. Had to use the adaptor piece. Had a few leaks until I used tape AND plumbers goop. I think that (goop) fixed it. Still very easy to install and price was great. Instructions were pretty good, gave multiple ways this could be installed depending on what you have in your wall. As of right now I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Redd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect original equipment + lots of shine to last
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like an original item to replace an original (should have been ) item. Looks great and it feels like it will endure the times ahead.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: It's either junk or I've got a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of junk. The plastic connector and the spout's thread itself are not well made. I could not get them to thread together. I'm not at all a clumsy person and I have don't ton of plumping works around the house. I ended up had to go to a local hardware store to get an American Standard replacement spout and that one took 5 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Hche

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Easy/versatile install if you need this style. A good value but not the highest quality. Should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sj Construction

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace the faucet in our bathroom and needed this color to match the rest of the bathroom. Works great and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Couple Of Luthers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The faucet spout was an easy replacement. Just following the included instructions made it simple. It seems to be a universal fit with instructions for several different mounting styles.
customer_reviews.author: Barb S

customer_reviews.title: Good brass colored faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the old worn out brass colored faucet in our new house and it works great. No more bad seals when you pull up the shower faucet tab.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Low cost and looks good, but leaks out the back
customer_reviews.text: While it looks nicer than the cheap replacement spigots you can get from the local hardware store, mine did exhibit leaking out the back, even with what looks like a good firm gasket fit around the water pipe. The non-Delta spigots in my other bathroom does not exhibit this same behavior.
customer_reviews.author: NumberH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement Spout
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the spout in the guest bath. Easy install and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaele

customer_reviews.title: Plastic adapter strips easily
customer_reviews.text: Horrible plastic adapter that gets stripped easily. Use all the plumbers tape you can on the threads to seal this slip on faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, Right Price
customer_reviews.text: I spent some time refurbishing the bathtub and shower, and this was one of the easier items to replace. Fortunately for me, the old one just spun off and this one, with the use of some thread tap, screwed right back on. It's not exactly the quality I would expect from Delta as it is rather thin and light, but for my short term replacement purposes, it fit the bill. Delta includes plenty of adapting parts with the kit in case your situation is not as easy as mine was.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Very easy install. Stop leaking water.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and easy to install. It only cost $20 instead of call plumber. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Took 5 minutes to remove the old and install this item. Quality seems very good. Sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect!!! The installation was super easy. Works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fluffy Angel 😇

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a really old faucet easily
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a bathtub faucet that was at least 30 years old that had no visible part number. This had clear instructions and we are very happy to have a new shiny faucet now with a diverter that works!
customer_reviews.author: FreeSpiritWear

customer_reviews.title: Universal
customer_reviews.text: It is truly universal. Can use the set screw at the bottom or it can screw on depending on what you have. Comes with the stuff to make work for numerous pipe sizes.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Worked great as a replacement for exact same Delta faucet that was not shutting off all the way when in shower mode. Too mucjh of the water was still coming out of the faucet. No matter how much I tried to remove mineral deposits and clean the plastic piece with o-ring, could not get much improvement. Finally bit the bullet and replaced with this and everything is now good as new.
customer_reviews.author: ictester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. No male presence required ;)
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and easy to install. I did it myself in about 5 min ;)
customer_reviews.author: Doniell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Good, basic faucet.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this all on my own! I needed a saw a piece to get it to fit (which was expected), so make sure you have one on hand. I didn't. Womp womp.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Be careful -
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when installing that you don't cross the threads - very easy to do. And you may need to shorten the feed pipe, and remove the old fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Footprints in the Water

customer_reviews.title: Well Finished Product
customer_reviews.text: Well finished Delta product which is exactly what you would expect from the famous company. It was easy to install and gave the bathtub a fresh new look.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sloane

customer_reviews.title: ... the set screw following all instructions and it leaked like crazy. It ruined my ceiling
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on 1/2" copper using the fittings provided for the slip-on method careful not to overtighten the set screw following all instructions and it leaked like crazy. It ruined my ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: It's too much of a pain for something that's supposed to be an easy replacement if you don't have a threaded pipe
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this if you don't have a threaded pipe. It's too much of a pain for something that's supposed to be an easy replacement if you don't have a threaded pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Mojave702

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Quick, easy and simple install. All the pieces needed for both connections types.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: The spout was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installed this Diverter Spout as a cheap alternative to replacing a Three way Diverter Valve in my shower. The spout was very easy to install. I was lucky and only had to unscrew my old one and screw this one on. The spout comes with adapters and directions to install in various situations.
customer_reviews.author: White raven

customer_reviews.title: Delta brand is a good investment
customer_reviews.text: I've bought off-brands. They are fine. But having been a home-owner for 30 years, I find Delta has been a better value in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Taowalker

customer_reviews.title: Know the correct opening
customer_reviews.text: Wrong head size. Too small leaving space on tile to be regrouted or replace tile.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Works and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and looks good. Easy to install and seems to be made well
customer_reviews.author: Apo

customer_reviews.title: Tarnished after 9 months - looks horrible now
customer_reviews.text: Had installed and looks great for about 9 months. Then it started to tarnish badly on top and now it looks terrible. Tried to clean but due to tarnish - it cannot be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: BC.

customer_reviews.title: Tub Spout
customer_reviews.text: Delta Faucet tub spout, in polished Brass, looks great with other brass fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Shower tub combo faucet.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very very quick and cheap fix. Took the old one off with a wrench counterclockwise cleaned up the threads on the copper pipe and put the tape provided around the threads. Screwed it back on applied chalking in behind it and was good to go. Mine would not convert to shower without holding up on the knob, works perfect every time now. Make sure you also chalk around pipe going into wall. If you dont can leak into your wall.
customer_reviews.author: Bub T

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise looks nice and a good value
customer_reviews.text: The inside tube is black plastic rather than metal and slightly fiddly (depending on your setup, you may need to hacksaw off the end, per instructions). Otherwise looks nice and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Only buy"universal"repair parts if it's all that's ava
customer_reviews.text: Too many parts. Don't believe that I have ever had a good experience with any "universal"repair part, especially with plumbing. I ordered the more expensive Delta direct replacement and of course it worked flawlessly and was a cinch to install
customer_reviews.author: Pete Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Nice Faucet
customer_reviews.text: The diverter in my old faucet stopped working so I picked up this replacement. The old faucet unscrewed and I screwed this one into place and everything works perfecty. I didn't realize how easy it is to replace bathtub faucets, it's like screwing in a lightbulb!
customer_reviews.author: K. Pound

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: I am no plumber. I hate plumbing. The only plumbing I have done is fix a leaking toilet. That said, even a super novice guy like me was able to use this product and replace my leaking shower diverter. I am very happy that the work took no more than a few mins. No leaks, no fuss, a quick and easy swap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two and they were great value good quality and easy to install would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: CDM

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works just as it should. No leaks when we pull the stopper up to use shower.
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy a guy can do it. Nice product, fast shipping and thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elly Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Love my new faucet.
customer_reviews.text: After a water leak, plumber suggested purchasing new hardware. Glad I did, this is perfect and cleans up water spots easily with Clorox wipe.
customer_reviews.author: WhatsErName

customer_reviews.title: Great for a New Look!
customer_reviews.text: My old tub spout was getting old and ugly. After a few years they get cankered up and just plain ugly. But for just a few bucks you can spiff up your bathtub. It is easy to install and well worth the money. Just make sure that you have the exact kind that you need for your specific tub spout. This one just screwed on and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: This unit was far from universal. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit was far from universal. I bought it to replace a Delta unit and this was completely incompatible with mine. I was able to go to Lowes and buy the correct universal model right off the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: P. B.

customer_reviews.title: I thought if I paid more it would be better than the last generic one I bought
customer_reviews.text: I paid a plumber to install this..and it leaks. I thought if I paid more it would be better than the last generic one I bought, but I was wrong. Since it already cost me way too much for the item and the install there is nothing I can do but replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Blondi

customer_reviews.title: Inside bits leaked
customer_reviews.text: It worked in the end but we had to extend the copper pipe so that it would reach the front of the faucet. The pieces supplied for use with short pipes just kept on leaking. Fortunately my husband can do a bit of plumbing, otherwise we would have had to call in an expert which would totally defeat the purpose of DIY.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Luc

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I thought it was and didnt work on ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I thought it was and didnt work on my type of connection the description was vague wished they would've showed the inside of spout to make sure it was the right one for me. Also to return the item I have to pay for shipping doesn't seem right to me!
customer_reviews.author: pazuzu

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a leaking diverter. Went on with put a fuss and is working fine. This is in a kids bathroom so it gets lots of rough use.
customer_reviews.author: Ollbuster

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Connector
customer_reviews.text: With light use it only lasted 4 months and broke at the threads that attach to the pipe. Looks nice enough and installs easily - good value but didn't hold up. Got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bowling

customer_reviews.title: I had to order a few to get one that ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a few to get one that was actually "universal." This worked, but it does require you cut some threading to fit the size of your specific tub pipe.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Inferior, leaky adapters
customer_reviews.text: Adapters provided to make this universal are inferior and leak. Unable to return and switch back to the old faucet because the instruction called for cutting threads off the existing pipe and using the compression fitting provided. I used a danco much less expensive in the other bathroom. 1/3 the costs and 5 minute job.
customer_reviews.author: Fb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and It Showed
customer_reviews.text: Leaked. It comes with a big plastic stem, and asks you to cut it, depending on the sort of pipe you need. Well, I cut it. It seemed to fit fine. But leaked like crazy. Got a bunch of plumbers take. Tried again. Leaking. I finally just ordered a different faucet. Cheap is not the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: It was a good fit although we ended calling plumber to attach it. I guess because the age of the house another length was needed for the faucet adapter but it took the plumber just what to do and finished in less than 5minutes!
customer_reviews.author: William Hollingshed

customer_reviews.title: It was fine but I didn't need it so I sent it ...
customer_reviews.text: It was fine but I didn't need it so I sent it back.. Hated that I had to pay postage.
customer_reviews.author: vince6501

customer_reviews.title: Which is good in many ways
customer_reviews.text: This is your average spout, totally unexceptional. Which is good in many ways. It works well, blends in with existing hardware, seems solid, etc. It's a good value for the price. Install was a cinch with a threaded pipe.
customer_reviews.author: reznil

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a couple from the big box store and they were absolute garbage. Highly recommend giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah McBride

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement. Although it surprised me that it was all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not quite universal
customer_reviews.text: Beware if your home is very old this "universal" fixture will more than likely not work. I would recommend taking the old one to your local wherever to be sure of the brand and style you want to order. One start for not being universal, Three stars because it is a very nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Five

customer_reviews.title: just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bathroom tub, easily replaced damaged unit, did not need any of the supplied fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Fiasco

customer_reviews.title: Okay buy. Ok quality. Ok price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Decent price. Machining average (could have been better). For the price it fit my need. Still working okay
customer_reviews.author: netsyseng

customer_reviews.title: great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: fit without ease. matched to the handle very well and quick to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Jacovini Jr

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous instrucitons
customer_reviews.text: It fit but if you followed instructions you would never get it on
customer_reviews.author: Tim Davis

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased that it came with multiple adapters to fit multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. I was pleased that it came with multiple adapters to fit multiple connection types (even though I didn't actually need any of them). Inexpensive, solidly constructed, and the diverter works smoothly and reliably. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: David M Hungerford III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was used to replace an old faucet and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good and really easy to replace it
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old spout couldn't be covert from bath to shower. Quality is good and really easy to replace it. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa Milk

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through a couple different faucets before finding one that didn't leak or look gaudy. This one has worked perfectly, looked non-offensive, and is easy to clean. If you're going through reviews trying to figure out which one won't be problematic, this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good but functions adequately.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very good. The diverter is not as sturdy as older Delta faucets. The flow is more like a spray. The old spigot went from half inch to 3/4 inch reducing the pressure. This is much better than replacing complete faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Faucet didn't fit and couldn't replace the existing leaky Delta ...
customer_reviews.text: Faucet didn't fit and couldn't replace the existing leaky Delta bath tub faucet, even though this new one looks the same as the old from the old, but interior connection has wrong! I was informed that I couldn't return because the two-week return was expired.
customer_reviews.author: cckikofun

customer_reviews.title: This item was easy to install but after 3 showers the facet came ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to install but after 3 showers the facet came off when I turned on water It broke a big chunk off the edge.I was not to happy to get out of shower and try to turn water off. I probably wont buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The spout was easy to replace and came with fittings needed to do the job. It has a really nice finish and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Water flow is weird, it just shoots out the end and is not in a uniform stream. But it works great for my daughters bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly easy to install once the old one was off (check online videos for good hints to removing an old faucet). I don't even know what brand my old one was, but this replaced it perfectly and I'm no longer shooting water sideways in shower mode.
customer_reviews.author: MamaOwl

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid chrome-plated brass tub spout
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid chrome-plated brass tub spout. It has that nice heavy/robust feel. It should last for many years. I returned one spout that I purchased from a local store because it was plastic and I felt it would not last for more than a few years.
customer_reviews.author: S. Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install even for a person who has no plumbing ability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for the 30 year old one we had in the rub.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lund

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shine, works great. Came with enough adapters that it would work in almost any replacement situation.
customer_reviews.author: oversixty

customer_reviews.title: Fine shine. Now finally not slimy.
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to install. Looks great. Slight drip when the plunger is pulled up for the shower function, but I think ever faucet I've ever owned has done this. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Wagar

customer_reviews.title: Poor product.
customer_reviews.text: Leaked into and under the tub. Wrecked the ceiling in the room underneath. NOT universal fit as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: meowsrus
